attributes.action: RADICALLY  reform the Britsh democratic process.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introduce Proportional Representation for the next general election, reduce the House of Commons to 400 members, reform the House of Lords into an elected Senate of 250, decentralise substantial powers and money to the regions, reduce the Prime Minister's power within the Commons, and reduce the power of the Whips.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
